title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1225.33 - Unauthorized interference with or use of terminal systems or equipment prohibited
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1225.33 - Unauthorized interference with or use of terminal systems or equipment prohibited

State Regulations

No person shall do or permit to be done anything which
may interfere with the effectiveness or accessibility of the fire-protection
system, sprinkler system, drainage system, alarm system, fire hydrants and
hoses, or portions thereof, or with the teleregister, telephone, conveyor
chain, pneumatic tube, public announcement and intercommunication systems or
portions thereof, installed or located at a truck terminal; nor shall any
person operate, adjust or otherwise handle or manipulate, without permission, any of the aforesaid systems or portions thereof, or any machinery, equipment
or other devices installed or located at a truck terminal. Tags showing date of
last inspection attached to any equipment shall not be removed
therefrom. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1225.33

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
